name: Fantasy Mosaics 5
description:
Challenge your mind with this new collection of mosaics puzzles and have fun discovering beautiful images in rainbow colors!

Staying true to the multi-color gameplay, this new installment features stunning background art coupled with exciting custom built puzzles based solely on logic.

Come join our penguin on a quest to turn an abandoned mystery place into a beautiful fantasy garden and make it a home for his family!


- Lots of custom built puzzles in color also known as picross, hanjie, nonograms, griddlers, paint by numbers.

- Stunning background art

- A unique game atmosphere

- Puzzles based solely on logic
